Text: Anything pro-Christian is a piece of crap, and that is putting it mildly.  All religions mislead mankind away from his critical thinking skills. There is no 'Creator' as such, but there is the creation (note - not the same as Creation theory, or whatever) - just read the material at the future of mankind co uk website.  There are sound logical ideas there, minus the political crap present in Christian idealogy, etc.

11 And have no fellowship with the unfruitful works of darkness, but rather reprove (expose) them.
 Look in the mirror lately?
